subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the author of the book 'Rajasthan Mitra'?
question_hi: राजस्थान मित्र को किस कवि ने लिखा है।
explanation_en: The author of the book 'Rajasthan Mitra' is Anand Bhushan. The book is a popular source of information about Rajasthan.
